name: The Molten Rock - Prologue
description:
This is a 2D action-platformer game made with Unity. It contains only the prologue, which is the first 20-30 minutes of the game. The combat is fast paced, challenging and requires management of stamina bar. The game is expected to be released some time next year, but first there will be more free demo versions.

The recommended resolution is 16:9.

Hell's Void, a dark and terrifying region, is a void in earth created many centuries ago.  It is inhabited by strange creatures. Humans have built fortresses there in order to stop the creatures from coming out to the surface. Average life span of soldiers is 3 months. The story follows a mysterious soldier who has lived a lot longer than the average.

- Xbox Controller -

- Mouse + Keyboard-


This is the alpha version of the game. Animations and sound design will be improved soon. The goal is to get as much feedback which can help the game get better.

If you enjoyed this game, it would be really helpful if you could support the development by giving us feedback or sending a donation. Anything is greatly appreciated!
